channel.title: How do I remove my server from the toplist?
channel.description: Hey all, I had some issues with uptime/downtime, so I got a VPS :) But now I need to: or change IP/reset uptime/downtime, or repost it, but I cant seem to find out how to remove the server?

item.title: How do I remove my server from the toplist?
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
item.description:
@aekramer wrote:

I couldnt find out where to change IP, so I reposted it with diff IP, nothing happend

Read full topic
item.source: How do I remove my server from the toplist?

item.title: How do I remove my server from the toplist?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“aekramer, post:3, topic:424749”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=527410.msg3844495#msg3844495 date=1323518459]
You can register the server under another IP (assuming you got a VPS) or wait until the server removes itself from the toplist as the script checks over it seeing if it’s online or not.
[/quote]

First option doesnt work (I want to keep the server name etc the same)
And how long would it take for it to be auto removed?[/quote]
Change the IP like he said, keep the name…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I remove my server from the toplist?

item.title: How do I remove my server from the toplist?

@aekramer wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

You can register the server under another IP (assuming you got a VPS) or wait until the server removes itself from the toplist as the script checks over it seeing if it’s online or not.

First option doesnt work (I want to keep the server name etc the same)
And how long would it take for it to be auto removed?
